text: Filippo Colombo (born 20 December 1997) is a Swiss cross-country cyclist. He competed at the 2018 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships, winning a gold medal in the team relay.Team relay results ==Major results== ;2014 : 1st 20px Cross-country, National Junior Mountain Bike Championships : 2nd 15px Team relay, UCI Mountain Bike World Championships ;2016 : 3rd 15px Team relay, UCI Mountain Bike World Championships ;2017 : 1st 15px Team relay, UCI Mountain Bike World Championships : 1st 15px Team relay, European Mountain Bike Championships : 1st 20px Cross-country, National Under-23 Mountain Bike Championships ;2018 : 1st 15px Team relay, UCI Mountain Bike World Championships : 1st 20px Cross-country, National Under-23 Mountain Bike Championships : European Mountain Bike Championships ::2nd 15px Under-23 cross-country ::2nd 15px Team relay : 3rd Overall UCI Under-23 Mountain Bike World Cup ;2019 : 2nd 15px Under-23 cross-country, UCI Mountain Bike World Championships : 2nd 15px Under-23 cross-country, European Mountain Bike Championships : 2nd Overall UCI Under-23 Mountain Bike World Cup ::1st Three rounds ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male cyclists Category:Swiss mountain bikers
title: Filippo Colombo
